about:
I am currently pursuing a B.Tech from IIIT Kota in Computer Science and Engineering with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence. I have a strong passion for machine learning, computer vision, and artificial intelligence. Solving new problems and finding innovative solutions are what drive me every day.


I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. In my academic journey, this passion has led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that enhance my problem-solving capabilities. For example, I have taken on various projects that required me to delve deep into machine learning algorithms and computer vision techniques, helping me to build a robust understanding of these fields.


 In addition to my technical interests, I enjoy exploring new technologies and keeping up-to-date with advancements in artificial intelligence. My goal is to contribute to cutting-edge innovations that can solve real-world problems and improve lives. I believe that continuous learning and practical application of knowledge are key to making significant contributions in the tech industry.
